name: Drawer
description: Mobile-optimized slide-in panel with swipe gesture support for touch devices

accessibility.screenReader: Announces as a dialog with role=dialog and aria-modal. Title is linked via aria-labelledby. Description via aria-describedby. Focus is trapped within drawer. Focus returns to trigger on close.
knownLimitations: Swipe gestures are not keyboard accessible but Escape key provides equivalent close functionality

recommendedUsage: Use for mobile navigation menus, filters, or secondary content panels. Configure slide direction (top, right, bottom, left) based on content type and UX patterns.
antiPatterns: Do not use for desktop-primary interfaces where Sheet may be more appropriate. Avoid putting critical forms in drawers on mobile where keyboard may cause issues.
